message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find highly valuable. I'm asking for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This reflects the true worth of the product.
I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to go up to $11,500. I'm trying to be fair, but I also need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $12,500 is my final offer, and I believe it's a very fair price considering the value this product will bring to your business.

I understand you're trying to meet me in the middle, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $12,000. I'm willing to go up to $12,000, but that's as high as I can go. I really think that's a fair price for this product.
